Articles.Content: If I try to fullscreen KSP it cuts the 2 sides ( left and right ) off and it gets very small, I tried to put in a image here but I can't get it to be in here so I hope this description is good enough?
Try changing the resolution till it fits and you're happy?
I tried that, but when I change it it either goes taller and smaller or just goes smaller, the 2 gutted of edges just stay there
Oops, it was the right answer but I just didn't check the last resolution option, sorry but I hope everyone has a good day
